item.title: MacBook Fresh Install - Part 1/? - Installation
item.description: Fresh Install macOS Mojave Requirements USB Device at least 8GB macOS Installer Download macOS Installer https://itunes.apple.com/de/app/macos-mojave/id1398502828?l=en&mt=12 Prepare USB Device Detect USB Device $ diskutil list Format USB Device $ diskutil eraseDisk HFS+ 'macosinstaller' disk<number> Create Installation Media $ sudo /Applications/Install\ macOS\ Mojave.app/Contents/Resources/createinstallmedia --volume /Volumes/macosinstaller Boot Into Installer Turn on MacBook with USB drive plugged in As soon as you press the power button, hold down the left “Option Key” until you see the boot selection screen
